include.ondrejmirtes/better-reflection: Provides reflection wrapper used for code analysis.

include-dev.spryker/checkout-extension: CheckoutExtension module is needed to create CheckoutExtension specific classes.
include-dev.codeception/module-symfony: ModuleSymfony module is needed to run test
include-dev.spryker/code-sniffer: CodeSniffer module is needed to check codestyle.
include-dev.spryker/data-import: DataImport module is needed to create DataImport specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/glue-application-extension: GlueApplicationExtension is needed to create Glue API specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/oms: Oms is needed to create Oms specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/payment-extension: PaymentExtension module is needed to create PaymentExtension specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/router: Router module is needed to create Router specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/sales-payment-extension: SalesPaymentExtension module is needed to create SalesPaymentExtension specific classes.
include-dev.spryker/step-engine: StepEngine module is needed to create StepEngine specific classes.
include-dev.codeception/codeception: We need a specific version of it.
include-dev.phpunit/phpunit: We need a specific version of it.

exclude.spryker/symfony: All dependencies are added on their own.
exclude.spryker/twig: Twig is added on its own.
